fields.name: Amount
fields.description: The charge of the transaction.

fields.name: ArmSkuName
fields.description: This is the ARM Sku name. It can be used to join with the serviceType field in additional info in usage records.

fields.name: BillingFrequency
fields.description: The billing frequency, which can be either one-time or recurring.

fields.name: BillingProfileId
fields.description: Billing profile Id.

fields.name: BillingProfileName
fields.description: Billing profile name.

fields.name: Currency
fields.description: The ISO currency in which the transaction is charged, for example, USD.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the transaction.

fields.name: EventDate
fields.description: The date of the transaction

fields.name: EventType
fields.description: The type of the transaction (Purchase, Cancel or Refund).

fields.name: Invoice
fields.description: Invoice Number

fields.name: InvoiceId
fields.description: Invoice Id as on the invoice where the specific transaction appears.

fields.name: InvoiceSectionId
fields.description: Invoice Section Id

fields.name: InvoiceSectionName
fields.description: Invoice Section Name.

fields.name: PurchasingSubscriptionGuid
fields.description: The subscription guid that makes the transaction.

fields.name: PurchasingSubscriptionName
fields.description: The subscription name that makes the transaction.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.description: The quantity of the transaction.

fields.name: Region
fields.description: The region of the transaction.

fields.name: ReservationOrderId
fields.description: The reservation order ID is the identifier for a reservation purchase. Each reservation order ID represents a single purchase transaction. A reservation order contains reservations. The reservation order specifies the VM size and region for the reservations.

fields.name: ReservationOrderName
fields.description: The name of the reservation order.

fields.name: Term
fields.description: This is the term of the transaction.
